title: US-Canada border closing temporarily to nonessential travel
text: President Donald Trump says the U.S. and Canada have agreed to temporarily close their shared border to nonessential travel due to the coronavirus pandemic. And two administration officials say the U.S. is considering turning back all people who cross illegally from Mexico into the United States. Trump tweets that the restrictions on the Canadian border will not affect the flow of trade between the countries. Canada relies on the U.S. for 75% of its exports and about 18% of American exports go to Canada. Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says travelers will no longer be able permitted to cross the border for recreation or tourism, but that essential travel will continue.
